description: An Evaluation is the core object of the Evaluation API, used to support collaborative data analysis challenges in Synapse.
name: Evaluation

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this Evaluation.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. The eTag changes every time an Evaluation is updated; it is used to detect when a client's copy of an Evaluation is out-of-date.

description.description: A text description of this Evaluation.

ownerId.description: The ID of the Synapse user who created this Evaluation.

createdOn.description: The date on which Evaluation was created.

contentSource.description: The Synapse ID of the Entity to which this Evaluation belongs, e.g. a reference to a Synapse project.

submissionInstructionsMessage.description: Message to display to users detailing acceptable formatting for Submissions to this Evaluation.

submissionReceiptMessage.description: Message to display to users upon successful submission to this Evaluation.

quota.description: DEPRECATED: use EvaluationRound API instead. Maximum submissions per team/participant per submission round
